title: Drawing, "The Ravine of Bellano, near Lake Como", 1810–20
markings: Watermark: peculiar form of Strasburg lily
inscribed: Inscribed in chalk: L'orido di balamo lago di como
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Gorge with waterfall, Pioverna, and bridge leading across. Below, at left, structure. Bordering lines, inscribed below by Giani in black chalk, L'orido di balamo lago di como.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "The Ravine of Bellano, near Lake Como", 1810–20.
1810–20. Black chalk on laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-2118.
